      • HealingPotionServlet

public HealingPotionServlet(com.revature.trial_by_combat.services.HealingPotionService healingPotionService)

        healingPotionService - calls the Challenge Action Item Data Access Object to interact with database.

      • updateHealingPotion

        @PutMapping
 @ResponseStatus(value=OK)
 @ResponseBody
public com.revature.trial_by_combat.models.HealingPotion updateHealingPotion(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                      com.revature.trial_by_combat.models.HealingPotion healingPotion)
        Updates the healing potion's information in the database. Sets the price based on the healing bonus and healing die.
        Parameters:
        healingPotion - The healing potion object to updated in the database
        Returns:
        A copy of the updated healing potion object
